reviewText: I know how desperately you would like this product to be all you hope it would be,  it is not.  If it was $50 dollars it would be worth buying at any price above it is not.  Really angry with myself for not trusting my gut and passing on this, will I ever learn?

I received the DVDs and I thought it was informational even though I have been dowsing for a year or a year and a half as of this writing.

This is worth the money and your time if this subject interests you.

Let me tell you right up front that this not for people that just want to watch something for entertainment. This is an in-depth training program with lectures, practice targets, feedback and homework. It is set up so you can actually track your progress and see yourself getting better and more accurate. The online community that comes with the course is a huge help for answering all of my questions and Major Paul Smith is very polite and seems to care about all of his students. If you're not sure about this just watch some of the "Paul Smith Learn Dowsing" videos on YouTube or at the official site. I see the price is now $149 on Amazon but I bought it when it was $199... it was still a great buy and I would order it again.

I'm not sure what some people were expecting with this training program, maybe some sort of touchy feely experience but if you want to ACTUALLY learn dowsing and use it so that it works, this is by far the most incredible training program I have ever seen. The course is far more than just info on dowsing, it's actually an interactive training program that teaching you exactly what's happening on a subconscious level during different steps of the dowsing process. It gives you interactive targets that you do and then get REAL feedback with a live class to see if you hit the target or not. This is dowsing training based on real science and effective techniques. Trust me, for the $$$ this program is AMAZING! Did I mention that it comes with FREE LIFETIME support at Major Paul Smith's online dowsing community? That alone is worth its weight in gold!

Maybe I was expecting more from a DVD but this is a total waste. Very boring and too little info given for the price. Buy a cheap book on dowsing and you'll be better off and more informed. Use the money saved to buy dowsing tools.
